title: Jagex Moderator

properties.name: description
properties.value: Jagex Moderators, also known as Staff Moderators, Jagex Mods, JMods, or admins, are employees working for Jagex Ltd. Jagex Moderator accounts are only used for work purposes such as play-testing, debugging, and dealing with in-game situations.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Jagex Moderator
"Administrator" redirects here. For the wiki usergroup, see RuneScape:Administrators.
The Old School RuneScape team, celebrating the launch of Twisted League.

Jagex Moderators, also known as Staff Moderators, Jagex Mods, JMods, or admins, are employees working for Jagex Ltd. Jagex Moderator accounts are only used for work purposes such as play-testing, debugging, and dealing with in-game situations.

Jagex Moderators also have access to certain tools to aid in community events or quality assurance that players do not have access to, such as the rotten potato, egg, cabbage, carrot, and strawberry. For security, employees can only login to a Jagex Moderator account while connected to a designated server. A selection of Moderators often appear on the weekly Old School RuneScape live stream where they discuss recent events, answer player-submitted questions, and show off upcoming updates.

Jagex Moderator accounts will always have a gold crown () beside their name when talking in public and private game chat and a gold background when posting on the forums. Jagex Moderator usernames will always begin with "Mod" with the exception of Paul, Ian, and Andrew, the creators of RuneScape. Additionally, Jagex has also made it so that players' names cannot begin or have the word 'Mod' in their name to prevent confusion and potential scamming among players (i.e. Rule 5, which is Jagex staff impersonation).

Contents

  • 1 Team composition
    • 1.1 Leadership
    • 1.2 The Wardens
    • 1.3 The Unknown
    • 1.4 The Operators
    • 1.5 The Juggernauts
    • 1.6 Graphics
    • 1.7 Game Engine Tech
    • 1.8 Publishing
  • 2 Former Jagex Moderators

Team composition[edit | edit source]

Leadership[edit | edit source]

The Leadership team is responsible for providing guidance, direction, and coordination to the other teams and Old School RuneScape as a whole.

Name Image Title
Mod Fed QA Manager
Mod Jndr Lead Producer
Mod John C Product Manager
Mod Kieren Associate Design Director

The Wardens[edit | edit source]

The Wardens are responsible for creating larger pieces of content aimed to retain and entertain existing players, as well as attract new players.

The team is currently led by Mod Ed.

Name Image Title
Mod Arcane Senior Content Developer
Mod Curse Senior QA Analyst
Mod Daizong Senior Systems Designer
Mod Dylan Senior Content Developer
Mod Ed Senior Content Developer
(Wardens Lead)
Mod Katies QA Analyst
Mod Oasis Content Developer
Mod Mack Junior Content Developer

The Unknown[edit | edit source]

The Unknown are responsible for refining the game's client features.

The team is currently led by Mod Lenny.

Name Image Title
Mod Gecko QA Analyst
Mod Lenny Senior Content Developer
(Unknown Lead)
Mod Squid Content Developer
Mod Tide Content Developer
Mod Wolfy Principal QA Analyst

The Operators[edit | edit source]

The Operators are responsible for delivering quality-of-life updates and responding to what the players want to see; these updates are the ones players will typically see in polls and weekly game updates.

The team is currently led by Mod Maylea.

Name Image Title
Mod Argo QA Analyst
Mod Kirby Junior Content Developer
Mod Halo QA Analyst
Mod Havik Junior Content Developer
Mod Maylea Content Developer
(Operators Lead)
Mod Roq Upload Manager

The Juggernauts[edit | edit source]

The Juggernauts are responsible for delivering large group-based game features.

The team is currently led by Mod Ash.

Name Image Title
Mod Ash Principal Content Developer
(Juggernauts Lead)
Mod Bruno QA Analyst
Mod Elena Content Developer
Mod Husky Content Developer

Graphics[edit | edit source]

The graphics team provide all visual assets for the game, and are also members of other development teams depending on project commitments.

The team is managed by Mod Deagle, the Associate Art Director.

Name Image Title
Mod Brow Artist
Mod Grub Concept Artist
Mod Jerv Concept Artist intern
Mod Ry Artist
Mod Skylark Junior Artist
Mod Soffan Character Artist
Mod West Artist

Game Engine Tech[edit | edit source]

The game engine team provide the work required for content developers to create content.

The team is led by Mod Vegard, the Lead Game Engine Developer.

Name Image Title
Mod Boko Game Engine Developer
Mod Dibber Senior Game Engine Developer
Mod Meat Game Engine Developer
Mod Morty Java Game Developer
Mod Nin Game Engine Developer
Mod Vegard Lead Game Engine Developer

Publishing[edit | edit source]

The publishing team are responsible for communicating with the players and act as the conduit for the game's releases, working closely with the development teams based on project commitments.

Name Image Title
Mod Archie Video Producer
Mod Ayiza Senior Community Manager
Mod Banjo Editorial Manager
Mod Ditto Product Analyst
Mod Errol Junior Copywriter
Mod Goblin Community Manager
Mod Kandosii Product Marketing Manager
Mod Light Community Manager
Mod Lottie Senior Product Analyst
Mod Nasty Product Analyst
Mod Sarnie Community Manager
Mod SteveW Customer Support Manager

Former Jagex Moderators[edit | edit source]

Name Image Title
Mod Acorn Associate Producer
Mod Alfred Artist
Mod Bonsai Executive Producer
Mod Day Junior QA Analyst
Mod Deagle Associate Art Director
Mod Delta Content Developer
Mod Flippy Content Developer
Mod Gambit Community Manager
Mod Gayns Brand & Product Marketing Executive
Mod Gee Junior Character Artist
Mod Ghost Senior Artist
Ian Gower Game Engine Developer
Mod Impact Junior Community Manager
Mod Jed Content Developer
Mod Krista Content Developer
Mod Kristy QA Analyst
Mod Lyric Project Manager
Mod Mat K Senior Product Manager
Mod Maz Content Developer
Mod Merchant Community Manager
Mod MikeD Product Director
Mod Munro Junior Content Developer
Mod Nexus Content Developer
Mod Reach Content Developer
Mod Ronan Senior Community Manager
Mod Stone Product Marketing Manager
Mod Sween Lead Community Manager
Mod TomH Lead QA Analyst
Mod Weath Anti Cheating Specialist
Mod Wolf QA Analyst
Mod Zuko Junior Content Developer

Jagex Moderator [[account]]s are only used for work purposes such as play-testing, debugging, and dealing with in-game situations. Jagex Moderators also have access to certain tools to aid in community events or quality assurance that players do not have access to, such as the [[rotten potato]], [[rotten egg|egg]], [[rotten cabbage|cabbage]], [[rotten carrot|carrot]], and [[rotten strawberry|strawberry]]. For security, employees can only login to a Jagex Moderator account while connected to a designated server. A selection of Moderators often appear on the weekly ''Old School RuneScape'' live stream where they discuss recent events, answer player-submitted questions, and show off upcoming updates. Jagex Moderator accounts will '''always''' have a gold crown ([[File:Jagex moderator emblem.png]]) beside their name when talking in public and private game chat and a gold background when posting on the forums. Jagex Moderator usernames will always begin with "Mod" with the exception of Paul, Ian, and Andrew, the creators of ''RuneScape''.
